name: Soccer Cup 2018 - Multiplayer
description:
Soccer Fans are in for a treat. Play for your favorite team, choose your color & play with your live opponent. Oh Yes Sir it is multiplayer.

Soccer Cup 2018 are about to start and teams are ready for their big win. Play soccer cup with your friends or AI because its a multiplayer extravaganza with cool graphics and epic player.

Features
- Multiplayer
- AI
- Cool Graphics
- Different Countries
- Awesome sound track
